text.content: Before we hit the court, know the block. Every neighborhood’s got its own vibe, its own game. Respect the traditions.

rich_text.plain_text: Before we hit the court, know the block. Every neighborhood’s got its own vibe, its own game. Respect the traditions.

text.content: Before the game starts, you and your opponent gotta agree on the rules. No debate, just lock it in and let’s ball.

rich_text.plain_text: Before the game starts, you and your opponent gotta agree on the rules. No debate, just lock it in and let’s ball.

text.content: Score Limit

rich_text.plain_text: Score Limit

text.content:
We usually run it to 11 — quick and sharp.
Want a longer grind? We take it to 21.
And sometimes, we gotta make it “win by 2” for that real test.

rich_text.plain_text:
We usually run it to 11 — quick and sharp.
Want a longer grind? We take it to 21.
And sometimes, we gotta make it “win by 2” for that real test.

text.content:
But if it’s serious, best of 3 games decides the winner. Two outta three, no shortcuts.
Each new game kicks off with the player who didn’t start the last one.

rich_text.plain_text:
But if it’s serious, best of 3 games decides the winner. Two outta three, no shortcuts.
Each new game kicks off with the player who didn’t start the last one.

text.content: Scoring Points

rich_text.plain_text: Scoring Points

text.content: Every bucket counts as 1 point, but if you pull up from deep, it’s 2.

rich_text.plain_text: Every bucket counts as 1 point, but if you pull up from deep, it’s 2.

text.content:
Unless you wanna keep it simple, then everything’s 1.
Either way, you better earn every point.

rich_text.plain_text:
Unless you wanna keep it simple, then everything’s 1.
Either way, you better earn every point.

text.content: Possession and Reset Rules

rich_text.plain_text: Possession and Reset Rules

text.content: Every attack starts with a check — ball in hand, pass it to your opponent, and wait for that return.

rich_text.plain_text: Every attack starts with a check — ball in hand, pass it to your opponent, and wait for that return.

text.content: But some games run without checks — just take the ball past the three-point line, and it’s game on.

rich_text.plain_text: But some games run without checks — just take the ball past the three-point line, and it’s game on.

text.content: When steal the ball, the offensive player must take the ball behind the three-point line before attacking. If they don’t and still score, the basket doesn’t count, and possession flips.

rich_text.plain_text: When steal the ball, the offensive player must take the ball behind the three-point line before attacking. If they don’t and still score, the basket doesn’t count, and possession flips.

text.content: After each attack, the ball can either switch to the opponent or stay with the attacker until they miss - commonly called “winner’s ball”. You must agree on this beforehand.

rich_text.plain_text: After each attack, the ball can either switch to the opponent or stay with the attacker until they miss - commonly called “winner’s ball”. You must agree on this beforehand.

text.content: Fouls

rich_text.plain_text: Fouls

text.content: Each player will be expected to call their own fouls and violations. No refs out here, so keep it real and call your own.

rich_text.plain_text: Each player will be expected to call their own fouls and violations. No refs out here, so keep it real and call your own.

text.content: After a non-shooting foul, the ball goes to the player who got fouled outside the three-point line, at the top of the key.

rich_text.plain_text: After a non-shooting foul, the ball goes to the player who got fouled outside the three-point line, at the top of the key.

text.content:
If you get hacked while shooting and still hit the bucket, the foul don't count (if you score while getting fouled, the basket counts, but possession goes to the opponent if that’s the rule you agreed on).
Miss the shot? Ball goes to you at the top.

rich_text.plain_text:
If you get hacked while shooting and still hit the bucket, the foul don't count (if you score while getting fouled, the basket counts, but possession goes to the opponent if that’s the rule you agreed on).
Miss the shot? Ball goes to you at the top.

text.content: Who’s Got First?

rich_text.plain_text: Who’s Got First?

text.content: Deciding who attacks first can be done in a few simple and common ways:

rich_text.plain_text: Deciding who attacks first can be done in a few simple and common ways:

text.content: Flip a coin, and the winner gets to choose whether to attack first.

rich_text.plain_text: Flip a coin, and the winner gets to choose whether to attack first.

text.content: Rock-Paper-Scissors: a quick and easy game to decide who starts.

rich_text.plain_text: Rock-Paper-Scissors: a quick and easy game to decide who starts.

text.content: Shooting Contest: both players take a shot from an agreed-upon spot (like the free-throw line or three-point line). Whoever makes the shot first gets to start.

rich_text.plain_text: Shooting Contest: both players take a shot from an agreed-upon spot (like the free-throw line or three-point line). Whoever makes the shot first gets to start.

text.content: Check Ball: sometimes players just pass the ball to each other (a casual "check") and let one player begin without any formal method.

rich_text.plain_text: Check Ball: sometimes players just pass the ball to each other (a casual "check") and let one player begin without any formal method.

text.content: Additional Rules

rich_text.plain_text: Additional Rules

text.content: Three-second lane rule’s in effect — no chillin’ in the paint.

rich_text.plain_text: Three-second lane rule’s in effect — no chillin’ in the paint.

text.content:
If there’s a jump ball, it goes to the player who’s down on the scoreboard.
If the score’s tied, offense gets it.

rich_text.plain_text:
If there’s a jump ball, it goes to the player who’s down on the scoreboard.
If the score’s tied, offense gets it.

text.content: You can also agree to no rebounds after each attack, whether you score or miss.

rich_text.plain_text: You can also agree to no rebounds after each attack, whether you score or miss.

text.content: Plus, if you wanna tighten up the game, set a dribble limit.

rich_text.plain_text: Plus, if you wanna tighten up the game, set a dribble limit.

text.content: Alright, that’s the game. But remember, rules don’t make champions — your hustle does.

rich_text.plain_text: Alright, that’s the game. But remember, rules don’t make champions — your hustle does.

text.content: Like Kobe said, “The moment you give up is the moment you let someone else win.”

rich_text.plain_text: Like Kobe said, “The moment you give up is the moment you let someone else win.”

text.content: So step up, respect the game, and leave it all on the court.”

rich_text.plain_text: So step up, respect the game, and leave it all on the court.”
